description: This is an Estate seated on 7,682 square meter of land comprises of 8 (Eight) blocks of semi-detached duplexes.Each semi-detached duplex comprises of 4bedrooms all en-suite, 2 living rooms, a guest toilet, kitchen, with a room BQ attached. One of the highbrow areas in the city of Abuja.

Strategically located in the heart of Abuja by Gilmore Construction Company Jahi. This Estate comprises of Six Six (6) units of Four (4) Bedroom Terrace Duplex with Servant’s Quarters seated on an area of 1,671.11 square meters of land. Truly stunning to behold, this building offers four generously appointed bedrooms – a master & Three spacious bedrooms. All en-suite & equipped with high quality bathroom.

Consist of 5 units of 4Bedroom Terrace Duplex with Servant’s Quarters on an areas of 1,132.85sqm of land located at Wuye District BO3, Cadestral Zone, Abuja. All rooms are en-suite and are completed and sold out.
Strategically located in the heart of Abuja by Wuye with close proximity to family worship center. This Estate consists of 6 units of 4Bedroom Terrace Duplex with Servant’s Quarters.

This estate is located at a fast-rising urban development area in Jabi. It is directly opposite CITEC estate.
 Our house types in the estate include:
 4 Bedroom Terrace with Servant’s Quarters attached.
 4 Bedroom Terrace with Modern Built and Finishing . 
 This house types describe above offers a new benchmark of different designs & taste for our clients which delivers a unique experience.

This estate is located at the reserved area with a serene environment of Arab road in Kubwa off Liberty Junction.
 Our house types in the estate include:
 2 Bedroom Flat (basic).
 3 Bedroom Flat (basic). 
 3 Bedroom Terrace Duplex 
 
 This house types describe above offers a new benchmark for residential schemes with an effortless combination of designs & functionality which ensures perfection & delivers a unique experience.

This estate is located at a fast-rising urban development area in Jabi. It is directly opposite CITEC estate.

 This house types describe above offers a new benchmark of different designs & taste for our clients which delivers a unique experience.
